ChapterShortDescription: Google Developers Group Ilorin is an initiative to concentrate the efforts of many developers in and around Ilorin to learn, share and get productive using the various Google products.
ChapterLongDec: Google Developer Group Ilorin is inspired by GDG Family . We started our journey in Jan 2019. We try to engage student developers, fresh graduates and professionals through our hack events & meetups. The motive is to create a local ecosystem of programmers & hackers in and around Ilorin. The technology awareness is main goal for first few years of the group.
aboutGDGProgram: GDGs are local groups of developers who are specifically interested in Google products and APIs. Each local group is called a GDG chapter and can host a variety of technical activities for developers - from just a few people getting together to watch our latest videos, to large gatherings with demos and tech talks, to hackathons.
